name: Mubes!
description:
Mubes! - abstract cell puzzle. By moving and mixing cubes, get a new set from the original set! Start with the simplest cubes-addition and subtraction operators and get to the most interesting ones that will change your perception of the game.

- 7 different types of cubes

- 3 parts of the levels using different cubes.

- 75 unique, challenging levels that reveal the mechanics of each cube.

- a counter with a minimum (or not) number of moves.
